original_text: For nation will rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom. There will be earthquakes in various places; there will be famines. These are but the beginning of the birth pains.
korean_text: 민족이 민족을, 나라가 나라를 대적하여 일어나겠고 곳곳에 지진이 있으며 기근이 있으리니 이는 재난의 시작이니라

sentences.original_text: For nation will rise against nation
There will be earthquakes in various places
These are but the beginning of the birth pains
